topics.body:
So I don't normally ask random Questions like this.

But why do people always get mad about circumcisions? Like what I mean is. 

I just got done seeing a post talking about "parents don't have the right to get their kids circumcised"

I don't understand? What is a Circumcision even used for? Like is it for medical reasons?

Is it important? What is it? It always Just seemed like a flap of skin to me. Please explain.
